quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Love For All, Hatred For None.
quotes.author: Khalifatul Masih III

quotes.quote: Change the world by being yourself.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Never regret anything that made you smile.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, do it well.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schiuller

quotes.quote: I could agree with you but then we’d both be wrong.
quotes.author: Harvey Specter
